Jason,

   Review of the NEAT portion of the HyperNEAT code indicates that =

speciate (and size thereof via pushback), is only called from 
adjustFitne=
ss, which is called from ExperimentRun::finishEvaluations. 
The seeming sig=
nifcance of this is that the size of species is zero for 
generation 0, whi=
ch in itself is not a problem, but there results an 
exception in
GeneticPo=
pulation::produceNextGeneration, associated with a call to 
getSpecies. Sin=
ce the species ID is undefined for generation 0 (since 
speciate has not ye=
t been called), the test "if(species[a]-
>getID()=3D=3Did)" will not be tru=
e. Was this intended? Please advise.

Thanks,
   Andy Carl
